TopicTitle: [GAME!] Describe the person above you in one sentence

Articles.Content:
This person makes me want to remember the leader\'s names of every RP nation.

(Also, do not look at my posting stats. Practically all in RP.)
69.15% of the above person\'s posts are roosting in RP.
The above person makes up a tenth of all posts in the Corporations Child Board in the Roleplay Board.
The above two people are rambling on about RP.
The above person is interested in ponies.
The above person is in a proxy competition for the economic capital of the world.
The above person is the current economic capital of the world.
Someone whom I have only seen post in the Games, Games, Games! Sub-forum.
Someone who appears to never read the RP board.
The person above is unaware that in every community there is a part that doesn\'t care for roleplay.
This person teaches valuable lessons.
The person above quotes Flixxbeatz
The above person is a mirialan.
This person suggested nuking something in a blocked forum.
The above person has a cartoon face for an avatar.
The person above was promoted to a global moderator position.
This person is online!
And you are not!
I believe that it\'s not paint.
The above person does not believe that the avatar of Kreuzung is made in MSPaint.
This person is one of my favourite KSP Moderators.
The above person doesn\'t care.
The above person has an animated .GIF avatar.
Presumably self-centered and well-dressed francophile-
someone who has posted in the greatest KSP thread in the electrosphere internet.
